TopicTitle: I think the Space Kraken converted my spacecraft:

Articles.Content:
So I was mucking about, trying to create an SSTO. Then I tabbed out of the game while leaving my rocket running and came back to this:

I think the Kraken decided to impart a bit of its soul into the spacecraft; I shall have to keep a close eye on it.
Whatever it's doing it seems to be effective.
How do we know that's not what the ship looked like before?
Does that ship use the cubic strut/girder? It looks kind of similar to some of the bugs that pop up when one tries to dock something with a docking port attached via a cubic strut.
